security_audit.summary: This is a documentation-only skill that provides templates and guidelines for creating AI agents. It contains no executable code, network calls, or file system access. The skill promotes security best practices including workspace isolation, budget enforcement, and verification requirements.

content.user_title: Create Custom AI Agents for Your Workflow
content.value_statement: Building AI agents from scratch is complex and error-prone. This skill provides production-ready templates that integrate seamlessly with Unite-Hub's agent ecosystem, ensuring proper governance, testing, and multi-tenant isolation.
actual_capabilities: Generates TypeScript agent templates extending BaseAgent class
Provides integration code for orchestrator routing
Includes registry configuration with budget and governance settings
Creates test templates with workspace isolation validation
Offers optional CLI runner for standalone execution
limitations: Requires Unite-Hub's BaseAgent class and infrastructure
Agents must pass 100% test coverage before deployment
Budget limits enforced at $10/day by default
Only supports Claude Sonnet model in template

prompt_templates.title: Create Email Processing Agent
prompt_templates.scenario: Build an agent to analyze and categorize incoming emails
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me create a new agent called EmailAnalyzer that processes email content, extracts key information, and categorizes messages by intent. Include proper error handling and workspace isolation.

prompt_templates.title: Build Data Analysis Agent
prompt_templates.scenario: Create an agent for processing marketing metrics
prompt_templates.prompt: I need a MarketingMetricsAgent that analyzes campaign performance data, identifies trends, and generates insights. Show me the complete implementation with tests.

prompt_templates.title: Develop Content Generation Agent
prompt_templates.scenario: Make an agent for creating social media content
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a SocialContentAgent that generates platform-specific social media posts based on campaign briefs. Include multi-language support and brand voice consistency.

prompt_templates.title: Implement Verification Agent
prompt_templates.scenario: Build an agent to verify other agents' outputs
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a VerificationAgent that reviews outputs from other agents for accuracy, compliance, and quality standards. It should flag potential issues and suggest improvements.

best_practices: Always implement workspace_id filtering to ensure multi-tenant isolation
Set appropriate budget limits based on expected usage patterns
Include comprehensive error handling and retry logic in processTask()
Write tests that verify both success and failure scenarios
anti_patterns: Never create agents without proper workspace isolation - this risks data leakage
Avoid hardcoding API keys or credentials in agent code
Don't skip verification requirements - this compromises system integrity
Resist the urge to set excessively high budget limits without justification

faq.question: Is this compatible with all Claude versions?
faq.answer: Templates use Claude Sonnet 4.5 but support any Anthropic model. Update the model parameter in the API call.

faq.question: What are the budget limits for new agents?
faq.answer: Default is $10/day per agent, configurable in registry.json. Total system budget is enforced across all agents.

faq.question: How do I integrate with existing workflows?
faq.answer: Add your agent's intent to orchestrator-router.ts. The orchestrator automatically routes matching tasks to your agent.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using custom agents?
faq.answer: Yes. All agents must implement workspace_id filtering, ensuring complete isolation between different users/tenants.

faq.question: Why do tests require 100% pass rate?
faq.answer: Production agents handle critical business data. 100% test coverage ensures reliability and prevents regressions.

faq.question: How does this compare to LangChain or AutoGPT?
faq.answer: Unite-Hub agents are purpose-built for marketing workflows with built-in governance, verification, and multi-tenancy.
